body.p: Jerry Pope of this Rockcastle County killed and murdered Wm Lesswell of this County without any provocation and has fled from justice I hope that you will offer a reward for his oprehension

yours truly
Granville Pearl
Judge of the 12th
Judicial Dist
of Ky

Rockcastle Co
$250. Reward for Jere. Pope
Iss Jany 31. 1863
